#define DistortImageTag   "Distort/Image"

#define ExpandBounds ( px,
py   ) 

Value:

{ \
  if ( (px) < min_x )  min_x = (px); \
  if ( (px) > max_x )  max_x = (px); \
  if ( (py) < min_y )  min_y = (py); \
  if ( (py) > max_y )  max_y = (py); \
}

#define InitalBounds ( px,
py   ) 

Value:

{ \
  min_x = max_x = (px); \
  min_y = max_y = (py); \
}
